review:
don't know why it didn't run well in theaters..  but really what a unique story. hats off to the writer. dialogues were hilarious. rajpal yadav and anupam kher were damn funny.. really amazing acting done by them during comical situations. but this time mithun chakraborty steals the show. the way he portrays the character dattubhai is just mindblowing. this character is one of my personal favorites. it has a nice message too. 
according to me this is one of the most underrated comedy-drama of bollywood
good content..it is very rare when we saw comic timing of mithun da.he is superb here.
it is quite entertaining. good performances by every one especially by mithun.
good flim with good content.but it needed some   good acting.the flim is quite a bit boring
good movie i like this so much
best movie like nayak movie best movie ever
while the story made sense there was actually very few parts that were funny :/
